Previous owner/ex-collection: Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche
Acquisition notes: EA 66416, EA 66417, EA 66418, EA 66419, EA 66420 purchased by Robert Curzon at Abydos in 9-15 February 1838 (see Muhs and Vorderstrasse, JEA 2008). In 1876, Robert Curzon's collection was placed on deposit in the Department of Manuscripts by his son Robin Curzon. Upon her death in 1917, his sister, Darea Curzon, bequeathed the collection the to the British Museum.
